name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Field Engineer with 9+ years of experience in application development and technical support. Proficient in digital printing technologies, fostering strong customer interactions, and skilled in problem-solving through detailed documentation and collaboration. Experienced in utilizing a robust tech stack including **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **.NET**, **C#**, and cloud services to develop innovative solutions. Proven track record in leading projects and providing training to ensure seamless integration of technology in various environments. Adept at communication and teamwork to enhance project success and operational efficiency.

Leveraged **application development** skills to design and implement a microservices architecture with **.NET Core**, ensuring scalability and maintainability of the system.
Enhanced system resilience and throughput by integrating **Apache Kafka** for real-time data streaming and **RabbitMQ** for task queuing.
Utilized **Redis** for caching frequently accessed data, achieving a **35%** reduction in database load and improved response times.
Developed RESTful APIs using **.NET**, seamlessly integrated with a **MongoDB** database, to facilitate data access across various services.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines on **Azure DevOps**, successfully reducing deployment time by **40%**.
Optimized **MSSQL** database queries and indexing techniques, resulting in a **20%** decrease in average query execution time.
Collaborated effectively with UX/UI designers to enhance the platform’s user interface, leading to notable improvements in user experience.
Designed and developed a reporting engine employing **D3.js** and **Three.js** for creating interactive data visualizations.
Established secure application frameworks with **JWT-based authentication** and authorization methodologies.

• Provided **technical support** and **problem solving** for clients in the digital printing industry, enhancing customer interaction and satisfaction, leading to a **15% increase** in client retention.
• Developed and maintained **application development** frameworks with **.NET Core** and **Angular**, ensuring high-quality deliverables in line with customer needs.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver projects on time, emphasizing **collaboration** and **communication** throughout the project lifecycle.
• Conducted comprehensive **training** sessions for end-users, improving adoption rates of new technologies by **30%**.
• Created thorough **documentation** for system processes and user guides, streamlining onboarding and support.

• Led initiatives to improve system efficiency using **Redis** for caching and **RabbitMQ** for task management, resulting in a **25% boost** in operational productivity.
• Mentored junior engineers in coding standards and best practices, which improved overall team performance by **20%**.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams, enhancing **communication** channels to ensure project alignment and improve project delivery times by **25%**.
Engaged in **problem-solving** activities to address and resolve customer challenges, resulting in a **30% reduction** in reported issues.

Utilized **engineering** principles to design and implement innovative solutions that enhanced product quality and service delivery.
Demonstrated **collaboration** skills by working with the development teams to bring customer feedback into the product design cycle, resulting in improved user experience.
